attributes.action: Allow free period products for girls up until they reach the age of 18.
attributes.additional_details:
By signing this petition you will help many girls, who unfortunately aren’t as lucky as some, to be able to get two free period products every single month. Why make girls pay for something they simply cannot help? 
Thank you for taking the time to read this and i hope that you consider signing my petition.
attributes.background: I believe that this topic is extremely important and should not be silenced. As a 14 year old girl, i am lucky enough to have a family who provides these products for me. But some girls don’t.
